title: Invisible Fate
description: Novel three in the paranormal romantic Suspense series, featuring Alex Noziak and the team members of the Invisible Recruits AgencyForced to choose, will dark magic be the only path.Hidden from a world unaware of magic, a recently and only partially trained group of operatives known as the Invisible Recruits are the only ones willing to stand between mankind and those powerful preternatural factions seeking to change the balance of power and gain world domination.Alex Noziak, part/witch, part/shaman, is imprisoned by a powerful Druid bent on changing her into a black-magic portal to release a three thousand year-old demon on the world.By trying to shield a juvenile witch from the Druid, Alex places the lives of her IR teammates in jeopardy.Her relationship with Bran is in turmoil, making him the last man she'll turn to . . . but the only one who can help her.Alex is placed between watching Bran die or saving the world. Choices. Choices.USA Today Bestselling author, Mary Buckham throws her readers into a world of danger, explosive conflict and dark magic as the team learns to fight the dark paranormal forces out to overthrow the world of humans.
author: Mary Buckham
